author: Simon Difford
description: Peach schnapps is borrowed from the Fuzzy Navel to influence this member of the Slow Comfortable family, its presence gives this cocktail a distinctive sweet peachy note.
name: Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink
